titleStmt.title: Vindiciae pharmacapolae, or An answer to the doctors complaints against apothecaries. Ou, poiei eas mia chelidōn.
titleStmt.author: T. C.

notesStmt.note: Final line of title is in Greek.
Verse: "'Tis strange to me, to see revenging sheets ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
